title: Confession of Love
verses: Mark 12:30–31 (WEB) — “You shall love the Lord your God… and your neighbor as yourself.”
John 14:15 (WEB) — “If you love me, keep my commandments.”
1 John 4:19 (WEB) — “We love, because he first loved us.”
body: Love is confessed by lips and proven by life. Receive God’s love, return it in worship, and reflect it in sacrificial service to others.
prayer: God of love, pour Your love into my heart. Teach me to love You wholly and to love others well in deed and truth. Amen.
